ProjectTitle: UPTIDER (UZ/KU Leuven Program for post-mortem Tissue Donation to Enhance Research), a unique setting to unravel treatment resistance and disease progression in patients with breast cancer.
InitialFeedbackHistory:

4. The MIBBI metadata standards may also be useful for your work, for example MISEQE for more information see https://fairsharing.org/3518. Redcap also generates metadata. 
5. Please note that if your project is part of a clinical trial data should be stored for 25 years, the UZL ethics committee recommends 25 years of preservation of all other data related to an ethics dossier.
